definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: Feel the body relax, feel the tenseness disappear, but do not fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 感覺身體放鬆，感覺繃緊消失，但是不要睡着。

sentences.english: He was a man whoseorigin was unknown and who disappeared without leaving a trace.
sentences.chinese: 他的身世未知，但消失的時候又不留一絲痕跡。

sentences.english: The disagreement among the family members healed over with time.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成員之間的不和隨着時間的流逝而消失。

sentences.english: Thou annointest my day with pep; my mug runneth over.
sentences.chinese: 你宣告了我充沛的一天，一切的疲憊必然消失不見。

sentences.english: This error will disappear after the main program has been defined.
sentences.chinese: 在您完成主程序的定義之後，該錯誤將會消失。

sentences.english: Even the sleepy Endymion was fascinated at the sight of the fair maiden as he opened his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 但眼前的一切很快消失，以致他誤認爲這是一場夢幻。

sentences.english: Will Online Anonymity Have Gone the Way of the Dodo by2020?
sentences.chinese: 2020年前，匿名上網這種形式是否會消失？

sentences.english: Standing there in the office, miserable, I wanted to vanish into the paneling.
sentences.chinese: 我傷心地站在辦公室門口，恨不得消失在門縫裏。

sentences.english: There is widespread speculation about what caused their disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 至於他們消失的原因有好多種推測。
對於過度監管的擔憂消失了。

sentences.english: For if dreams go. Life is a barren field. Frozenwith snow.
sentences.chinese: 如果夢想消失了，生活就變成了積滿冰雪的不毛之地。

sentences.english: This is a visual effect that shows the picture disappearing to indicate that the picture has been deleted.
sentences.chinese: 這種視覺效果顯示照片消失的過程，表示已經刪除它。

sentences.english: This has now almost entirely vanished - and it is not entirely the fault of the men.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況現在已經完全消失了，而且錯不完全在男方。

sentences.english: The loss of further reed-beds led to them declining once more.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦墊的進一步消失導致它們又一次數量驟減。

sentences.english: When he heard these words, he felt his inner doubts melt away.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這些話時，他感到自己內心的懷疑消失了。

sentences.english: So, collaboratively filter and recommend or die?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，協同過濾和推薦會消失？

definition: to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to bury/to submerge/to pass into oblivion/to obliterate/to annihilate (physics)
to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low
to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to be forgotten/to fade from memory
to have disappeared/to be missing/nowhere to be found
